document_data.name: Devil's Eye
document_data.mainbody: '''''Devil's eye''''' was a [[divination]] [[spell]] that gave the caster a [[devil]]'s eyesight.
document_data.Effects: On casting ''devil's eye'', the caster's eyes gained the eyesight of a devil. However, it was a downgraded version of it. This spell's recipient could see through normal darkness, but only to a range of 30 ft (9.14 m) through magical darkness.
document_data.Components: The casting of ''devil's eye'' required somatic and verbal components.
